text:
I fully agree! I’m trying to convert this one Python Tensorflow notebook to Flux, and I’m just re-using the original Python code to read an ABC formatted file. It also calls a shell script to convert it to WAV and plays it in the Jupyter notebook.
It just works. Incredible.
And I read almost none of the PyCall documentation.

elements.text:

text: It seems like a lot for one person to handle.
